channel.title: Draw on 黄庄以北

item.title: Learn excalidraw
item.description: https://excalidraw.com/ Keyboard shortcuts Tools Tool Press This Hand (panning tool) H Selection V or 1 Rectangle R or 2 Diamond D or 3 Ellipse O or 4 Arrow A or 5 Line L or 6 Draw P or 7 Text T or 8 Insert image 9 Eraser E or 0 Frame tool F Laser pointer K Pick a color from the canvas I or Shift + S or Shift + G Edit line/arrow points Ctrl + Enter Edit text / add label Enter Pick a color from canvas Enter or Shift + Enter Finish editing (text editor) Esc or Ctrl + Enter Curved arrow A + click + click + click Curved line L + click + click + click Add a new line (text editor) Q Prevent arrow binding Ctrl Add/ Update link for a selected shape Ctrl + K View
